name: Myth: History in the Making
storyline:
You are taken far, far back in time to confront the evil God Dameron, who has taken control and is changing good Gods to bad. He is upsetting our past and future and our destiny.

Myths are no longer theory myth is reality.

Your adventure takes you through the mythological eras of time, to stop the spread of evil, to question the judgements of the Gods, to call the bluff of demons and to set the record straight.

Myth is no longer part of the imagination. MYTH IS HISTORY IN THE MAKING...
summary:
In this platform game, you are a mere mortal who has been called by the Gods to defeat several mythological creatures that have been turned bad by the evil Dameron.

Myth: History in the Making is a platform game with a lot of fighting. The levels of this game deal with different mythologies, from ancient Greece to the Vikings, over to Valhalla (where none other than the hammer-wielding Thor awaits you), and more.
